casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Timothy BLACKWELL. No. 490PA04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 16, 2006. Patricia A. Duffy, Robert C. Montgomery, Amy C. Kunstling, Assistant Attorney Generals, Michael Nifong, District Attorney, for State of NC. Marilyn G. Ozer, Chapel Hill, Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Timothy Earl Blackwell.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of October 2006 by Attorney General for Leave to File Reply Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of October 2006."
